Articles.Content: These would crop up for vessels that you put in orbit on previous contracts. If you take the contract some random parts of the vessel in question will be damaged and you have to take an engineer there to repair them. This will give you an incentive to revisit old satellites that you just put up and forget otherwise.
Very good idea, I'll chat with nightngale about doing this with the ContractConfigurator

+1

Anything to make Tourist contract less numerous.

Yes, please. Also would like to see the implementation of the toolbox there were pictures posted a while back. Also screwing/unscrewing/replacing of small pieces on EVA.
